select * from CUSTOMER_INFO where phoneno = '12312312311'-- 客户信息表 select * from BUSINESS_APPLY where serialno='20190802000000006' --授信申请表 select * from FACE_LIST ----人脸信息 select * from CUSTOMER_FACECHECK where customerid='20200629000000017' --人脸信息 select * from CUSTOMER_FACECHECK_LOG where customerid='20200707000000024'--人脸信息 select * from CUSTOMER_REALNAME_LOG where certid = '140421199006297753'--实名信息表 select * from customer_realname_log --实名流水表 select * from PRODUCT_TERM_INFO where productid = '7017' and capitalcode = '787' for update --产品参数
select * from CUSTOMER_REALNAME_LOG where status in ('03','04') and inputdate BETWEEN('2019/02/27')AND('2019/02/28')--实名信息异常取消当天笔数统计 select * from code_library cl where cl.codeno='ESBConfig'--日志查询表 select * from loan_credit_records where id_card='320681198909240017' and status='0'for update--额度平台在途件（在途后再次申请，报错时查） select * from loan_limit where id_card='410102199007183213' --额度状态表 320681199410156814 320681198909240017 select t.*, t.rowid from LOAN_LIMIT t where t.id_card='410102199007183213'--额度状态表
SELECT * FROM CHANNEL_CARD_INFO where creditreqno = '202001023344005'--四要素验证通过保存银行卡信息
select * from apply_suanhua_datainfo select * from apply_suanhua_device --算话 select * from apply_suanhua_network select * from apply_suanhua_user where dev_name='iPhonexs' select table_name from user_tab_columns where column_name='bankno'--根据列查表 select * from FACE_LIST ----人脸信息 select * from CUSTOMER_FACECHECK where customerid='2019072488688001' --人脸信息 select * from CUSTOMER_FACECHECK_LOG where customerid='20190225000010005'--人脸信息 select * from CUSTOMER_WHITELIST where phoneno like'%2651%'--客户白名单 select * from CUSTOMER_INFO where phoneno like'158%3575'--客户信息表 select * from CUSTOMER_INFO where phoneno ='13611111133' --for update select * from audit_task where customerid='20190314000000001' --改数据授信成功 --for update 20190306000004007 select * from PUTOUT_APPROVE 342601199208145613 13235662667 select * from code_library where codeno ='FlowNo' --授信申请阶段 select * from BUSINESS_APPLY where customerid=' 20200527000000030'--授信申请表查看白名单来源where serialno='20190223000000013' --提现申请表--提现申请流水号查询 select * from trans_log where reqtime is not null and customerid ='20200527000000030' order by reqtime desc--调用接口日志客户号 select * from no_application_allowed --超每日申请量落的客户信表 select * from CUSTOMER_INFO where phoneno like'%13235662580%'--客户信息表 --for update select * from PUTOUT_APPROVE where customerid='20191021000006002'--提现表 update customer_whitelist cw set cw.time = substr(to_char(add_months(cw.UPDATE_DATE,cw.time),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),0,10) select putoutDate from acct_loan where serialno='2019072200001'--借据表 select * from audit_task where customerid ='20190226000012001' --同盾 select * from td_gps_location --同盾gps表 select * from cl_info where customerid ='20190311000000004'--额度台账 --for update select * from system_setup
select * from cl_info where status='4' select * from exception_warn_record --业务告警信息库 --for update select count(*) from BUSINESS_APPLY where APPLYSTATUS in ('3','9','999') and occurdate='2019/02/27'--授信异常取消失败当天笔数统计 select * from CUSTOMER_REALNAME_LOG --实名信息表 select * from CUSTOMER_REALNAME_LOG where status in ('03','04') and inputdate BETWEEN('2019/02/27')AND('2019/02/28')--实名信息异常取消当天笔数统计 select * from PUTOUT_APPROVE order by inputtime desc --提现申请表 select * from PUTOUT_APPROVE where customerid ='20190802000004001' select count(*) from PUTOUT_APPROVE where showstate in ('3','4','5') and inputtime BETWEEN('2019/02/27')AND('2019/02/28') --提现申请信息异常取消失败当天笔数统计
select * from td_risk_item where objectno='48347DF6790C40899420A414A2AB0FAD' --for update

select * from ins_response_data where applyno ='20190225000010004'--ins命中明细

select * from icr_list where certno ='220602199007186395'--人行征信 select * from icr_list where certno ='220602199007184031'--人行征信 select * from LOAN_RECORDS where id_card='220602199007186395'--额度平台借据表 select * from trans_log where reqtime is not null and servicename like'%SecondCreduitQuery%' order by reqtime desc--二代征信 select * from marketing_message_info where applyid = '20190425000000001' and phoneno = '16633663366' --推送短信平台记录 select * from customer_info ci where ci.phoneno ='16633660001'--短信 select * from customer_info_log cil where cil.customerid ='20190426000006009'--短信 select * from LOAN_LIMIT where id_card ='110101198901060216'--额度台账 select * from LOAN_LIMIT where product_id ='7013' select * from PRODUCT_CONFIG_INFO --for update --基础产品配置 select * from channel_apply_info cai where cai.idno ='110101198902205384'--渠道授信流水表 SELECT * FROM business_apply where channelapplyno='20190323000000015'--授信申请流水表
select * from APPLY_REGISTER_INFO where phoneno='13800030011'--注册表 select * from CUSTOMER_INFO where phoneno = '15574177417' -- 客户信息表 for update commit select * from CUSTOMER_INFO --customername = ''and where phoneno like '158%8999' select * from CUSTOMER_HISTORY where phoneno='13611111133'--客户信息历史表 select * from CUSTOMER_REALNAME_LOG where phoneno='15835713571'--实名流水表 select * from CUSTOMER_FACECHECK where customerid = '20190404000000001'--人脸信息 select * from BUSINESS_APPLY where customerid = '20190629000010008' --授信申请表 select * from CL_INFO where customerid = '20190404000000001'--额度台账 select * from PUTOUT_APPROVE where customerid = '20200217000000011'--提现申请表 select * from PUTOUT_APPROVE where customerid = '20200326000000006'--提现申请表 select * from PUTOUT_APPROVE where channelputoutsno = '202003098686001'--提现申请表
select * from acct_loan a where serialno='' or a.policyno='PBLG201931170422000077' for update --改时间 select * from acct_loan where policyno='PBLG201931171845000068'--查loan_no select * from acct_loan where serialno = '20191120104128619619' select * from trans_log where reqtime is not null and customerid ='20190328000000002' order by reqtime desc--调用接口日志客户号 select * from audit_task where customerid='20190314000000001' for update --改数据授信成功 select * from exception_warn_record --业务告警信息库 --for update select * from CARD_BIN where BINNO = '621210' select * from code_library cl where cl.codeno='ESBConfig'--日志查询表（抓日志查询字段） select * from loan_credit_records where id_card='130403198001010419' --and status='0'--额度平台在途件（在途后再次申请，报错时查） for update select * from PUTOUT_APPROVE where customerid='20191121000006020' --for update ---提现流水表清数据 SELECT * FROM PFA_INSURANCEPOLICYINFO where CHANNELPUTOUTAPPROVENO='20191121000004'for update ------投保流水表清数据 select * from PUTOUT_APPROVE where customerid='20190819000006032' COMMIT

delete from CUSTOMER_BANK_CARD where customerid = '20200708000002001' delete from CHANNEL_APPLY_INFO where customerid ='20200708000002001' delete from channel_apply_info c where c.idno = '371401198211131908'--清数据 delete from customer_info c where c.certid = '371401198211131908'--清数据 delete from customer_realname c where c.certid = '371401198211131908'--清数据 delete from customer_realname_log c where c.certid = '371401198211131908'--清数据 select * from customer_info cc where cc.certid='412702199810032718' delete from putout_approve where customerid ='20200708000002001'--清数据 delete from BUSINESS_INSURANCEPOLICYINFO where customerid ='20200708000002001'--清数据 delete FROM PFA_INSURANCEPOLICYINFO where CHANNELPUTOUTAPPROVENO='2019121266660005' ------投保流水表清数据 SELECT * FROM PFA_INSURANCEPOLICYINFO where IDNO='330700199402010398'for update ------投保流水表清数据 commit --改数据库时间 update system_setup set businessdate='2031/04/11', batchdate='2020/04/11' where systemid='1' update system_setup set businessdate='2020/06/29', batchdate='2020/06/29' where systemid='1' update system_setup set businessdate='2031/03/16', batchdate='2031/03/16' where systemid='1' select * from system_setup --for update commit
select * from SECONDCREDIT_THIRD_RECORD --for update --人行征信 SELECT * FROM BUSINESS_INSURANCEPOLICYINFO where customerid='20191212000002010' for update --保单信息表 SELECT * FROM PFA_MOBILEBRIEF where channelcustid='2019070488668011' select * from PHONE_CALL_INDEX where creditreqno = '2019071588668012'--ins落库 select * from channel_apply_info cai WHERE cai.creditreqno ='20190720190703886680020186668002' select * from PFA_MOBILEDETAIL where creditreqno = '2019070488668018' select * from PFA_accfundLoan where creditreqno = '2019070588668020' select * from pfa_accfundbasic where creditreqno = '2019070488668018' select * from pfa_MOBILEBILL where creditreqno = '2019070488668012' select * from pfa_familie where creditreqno = '2019070488668018' SELECT * FROM business_apply where customerid='20191008000002001'--授信申请流水表 SELECT ItemDescribe FROM code_library where codeno='PolicyTypeFlag'for update --更改投保新老流程 SELECT * FROM BUSINESS_INSURANCEPOLICYINFO where putoutApproveNo='20191114000000002'--对应的这笔 查保单（提现申请流水号查询） SELECT * FROM queue_task where objectno ='202009030000000002' and objecttype ='jbo.app.PUTOUT_APPROVE' order by runtime for update nowait-- 查流程节点 SELECT * FROM queue_task where objectno ='202007060000002001' and objecttype ='jbo.channel51.CHANNEL_APPLY_INFO' order by runtime for update nowait-- 查流程节点 COMMIT SELECT * FROM image_list i where i.signloanno='20200408000004005' for update
